Params: {3: 'Goldfinch entered the Golden Vortex through the sandstorm according to the planned timeline.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Browning', 3: 'What a... shitty place. This joint operation has—G-Goldfinch at the forefront...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: 'Our mission is to scout the area... But—I-I think—w-we can contribute more...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "During the briefing—l-last time—Commander Nikola's expression was very clear... a-about how disappointed—he was at us...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: 'He equipped us with—t-the best scouting gears... and we only delivered a route through the man-made sand storm...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Goldfinch Member', 3: "Browning's right. Not to mention that this is a joint operation! I heard that the famed Gray Raven is among the squads assigned. We must take this opportunity to showcase our abilities!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "If we can't deliver—v-valuable intel... then the Goldfinches will only—b-be assigned missions... in the Arctic.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "I've decided—t-to adjust the perimeter of our scouting area... It now includes the center of the Golden Vortex!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Browning', 3: "I-if we need to clear all these sand—t-then so be it. Goldfinch will figure out what's the deal with this place...", 4: '1'}
